ComicInfo.Series: The Green Hornet '66 Meets the Spirit
ComicInfo.Summary:
KATO is fatally wounded! But as THE GREEN HORNET rushes him back to Central City, it becomes clear that only one man can save Kato’s life…their hateful enemy, THE SPIRIT! The final shocking issue from FRED VAN LENTE and BOB Q!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Ty Templeton | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Ty Templeton | 2 |
